value.name: Opinion: Could King Charles’ cancer diagnosis mend the fissures in the royal family?
value.description: The news of of King Charles’ cancer diagnosis should merit all of our sympathy. It could also be a prime moment for the British monarch to reconcile with Prince Harry and his family, writes journalist Jill Filipovic.

value.description: Prince Harry is back in the United Kingdom to see his father, King Charles, following the British monarch's cancer diagnosis.

value.name: Royal family tree: King Charles’s children, siblings and grandchildren explained
value.description: The King has two children, both by his first wife, Lady Diana Spencer. He married Diana in St Paul’s Cathedral in 1981, and the pair divorced in 1996. She died in a car crash in Paris a year later.

Prince Harry landed in the UK alone on Tuesday afternoon and was seen turning up at Clarence House. According to Sky News, The Duchess of Sussex, Meghan Markle, and their children are still in California.

value.name: Only a third of parents put safeguards on their children's device
value.description: As parents try to navigate the ever-shifting online world and balance it with their children’s needs and wants, online safety tools have become essential to help protect young people. But new research from Apple to mark Safer Internet Day revealed that only three in 10 parents have actually implemented safeguards on their child’s device.

value.name: King’s cancer ‘caught early’ as Prime Minister vows country will 'crack on'
value.description: King Charles has been diagnosed with cancer, Buckingham Palace confirmed yesterday. The cancer was detected when the King, aged 75, was undergoing treatment for benign prostate enlargement and he has now started a course of treatment. He has been advised to postpone his public-facing duties.

value.name: Sky News viewers shocked at King Charles blunder after cancer diagnosis

value.name: Prince Harry will rush home to the UK after Charles’ cancer diagnosis
value.description: The Duke of Sussex has spoken with King Charles III about his cancer diagnosis and will travel to the UK to see him in the coming days, a source close to Prince Harry has said. Buckingham Palace revealed in a statement on Monday that the monarch had been diagnosed with cancer. They declined to disclose the type of cancer.

value.description: Buckingham Palace’s announcement on Monday evening UK time that King Charles III had been diagnosed with cancer sent newsrooms scrambling. But new research from Apple to mark Safer Internet Day revealed that only three in 10 parents have actually implemented safeguards on their child’s device.

value.name: ITV This Morning star's brutal dig at Prince Harry and Meghan Markle over King Charles visit
value.description: Journalist Camilla Tominey took aim at Prince Harry and Meghan Markle on This Morning on Monday. It came on the back of King Charles reportedly approving plans to allow luxury campers on the grounds of his private estate at Sandringham. A total of 28 all-weather glamping facilities will be installed on the site, as well as 12 new pitches for tents.

On Twitter both #MeghanMarkle and #Markle hashtags are not trending favourably.

value.name: King’s cancer ‘caught early’ as Prime Minister vows country will 'crack on'
value.description: King Charles has been diagnosed with cancer, Buckingham Palace confirmed yesterday. The cancer was detected when the King, aged 75, was undergoing treatment for benign prostate enlargement and he has now started a course of treatment. He has been advised to postpone his public-facing duties.

value.name: Sky News viewers shocked at King Charles blunder after cancer diagnosis
value.description: Sky News viewers were left stunned at a reporter’s blunder over King Charles, following the news of his cancer diagnosis. As the nation and world reacted to the shock announcement, broadcasters delivered breaking news and expert commentary.

value.name: Prince Harry will rush home to the UK after Charles’ cancer diagnosis
value.description: The Duke of Sussex has spoken with King Charles III about his cancer diagnosis and will travel to the UK to see him in the coming days, a source close to Prince Harry has said. Buckingham Palace revealed in a statement on Monday that the monarch had been diagnosed with cancer. They declined to disclose the type of cancer.

value.name: King Charles III Cancer Diagnosis Dominates UK Headlines Amid Speculation Of Prince Harry Rapprochement
value.description: Buckingham Palace’s announcement on Monday evening UK time that King Charles III had been diagnosed with cancer sent newsrooms scrambling. The shock diagnosis comes just 17 months after the 75-year-old King took to the throne following the death of his mother Queen Elizabeth II in September 2022 after a 70-year reign.
